content.question: What is one significance of the business advertised?

choices.label: The business cultivated a vision of African American academic success.
The business demonstrated attempts to restrict African American women to domestic roles.
The business highlighted the work of the Black Arts movement.
The business promoted personal care products and was owned by a Black entrepreneur.

content.answer: The business promoted personal care products and was owned by a Black entrepreneur.

skill.text: 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's perspective, purpose, context, and audience.
